entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
